name: L.A. Hellway
description:
**WARNING!! This game is full of bugs that may disrupt gameplay.

L.A Hellway is a shoot 'em up sidescroller set in Los Angeles in a post-apocalyptic world. The game combines 2D characters to a 3D world. Your goal is to survive the enemy onslaught, comprised of radiated chainsaw psychos and bombers for as long as you can.

Controls:

  • Movement - Arrow Keys
  • Shooting - X
  • Jump - Z
  • Special Ability - V

Game by:

 Stefan Dolidis & Andrew Hudson
